race.name: Lutrinian
entries: As a lutrinian, you have the following special traits

entries.name: Age
entries: A lutrinian reaches adulthood at the age of 5 and they rarely live past 50 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Due to their playful nature most lutrinians are chaotic. Fun being their imperative they are, more often than not, neutral.

entries.name: Size
entries: Lutrinian stand between 4 and 5 feet tall and average about 75 pounds. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Speed
entries: Your base walking speed is 25 feet. You also have a swimming speed of 30 feet.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: Accustomed to life underwater you have superior darkvision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light withing 60 feet as if you were in bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness only shades of gray.

entries.name: Charming
entries: Your natural charm gives you proficiency in the Persuasion skill.

entries.name: Lutrinian Combat Training
entries: You have proficiency with spears, slings and tridents.

entries.name: Tool Proficiencies
entries: You gain proficiency with one of the following tool kits: Carpenter's tools, Tinker's tools, Navigator's tools or Thieves' tools.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common. You can also communicate with Small beasts and smaller.

entries.name: Lutrinian (River)
entries: Living in small enclaved cities along river banks, river lutrinians are not welcoming of outsiders.

entries.name: Ability Score Increase
entries: Your Charisma score increases by 1.

entries.name: Territorial
entries: When a creature you can see moves within your reach, you can use your reaction to make an opportunity attack against the creature.
Once you use this ability, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.

fluff.name: Lutrinian
entries: On their floating city ships or in recluse walled river cities, lutrinians are always working with water to make a better life for themselves. The smell of fish and the gentle lapping of the waves is their constant companion. Explorers and adventurers, they have probably reached farther on the sea than any other race can claim to have.

entries.name: Lissome and Charming
entries: Agile and fast, the small lutrinians are excellent at avoiding their numerous predators. Sometimes hunted for their thick and warm fur by the less scrupulous members of society the lutrinians develop survival skills early on. Their webbed hands and feet and their powerful tail makes them exceptional swimmers.

If captured they rely on their wits and winning smile. Nobody will deny how adorable they can be when they are not on the wrong side of a prank, and even then their natural charm will often get them out of sticky situations.

Their small stature and short limbs can be detrimental when fighting, that's why they tend to favor weapons with a longer reach like polearms, harpoons and pikes, or ranged weapons akin to bows, crossbows, slings or even bolas.

entries.name: Coast and River Banks
entries: Wherever it might be on the golden coast of the far east or the freezing fjords of the north, lutrinians are always living near a body of water. Constructing at least part of their cities on stilts or outright making their abode something that floats and can be moved if need be, the lutrinians have lots of tricks to fish, from nets dragging under to colonies of shellfish growing on the stilts of their cities, giving them an almost endless source of food.
The lutrinians spend a lot of time with their family, grooming each other to maintain the waterproof characteristics of their fur, creating deep bonds between the members of a clan.

Most lutrinians rarely go far in land, they are far more at ease near bodies of water, but if the reward is enticing enough, it might be the promise of a jolly good time, the quest for a particularly tasty beverage or maybe their trying to find the secret to a longer life, they will venture outside of their comfort zone.

entries.name: Playful Tricksters
entries: Due to their short life span, lutrinians try to make the most of every day. They live in the moment not wary of consequences. Always looking to amuse themselves they often play tricks on their entourage. A night spent with a lutrinian is not something you easily forget.

Lutrinians favor occupations offering amusement and fast rewards. Piracy, thievery and adventuring play a big part of their lives. At ease on the waters they make great ship captains and deck hands. Some turn to a life of entertainment performing shows and regaling crowds with grandiose tales and epic ballads about the accomplishment of famous lutrinians of past and present.
At birth, a lutrinian is given a name and if they are born from a long bloodline, a family name.

entries.name: Male Names
